name: Destroyed Drawings - NYX (stained)
description:
3281 x 4217 png 300dpi
Suitable for printing. 

A series of images of drawings where the original object is destroyed, inaccessible, ruined, or missing. The photo or scan is the only trace.

NYX goddess of the night. 

This was a counter-proof mono print onto which I painted with bistre ink. I experimented with many different looks scanned this one in and then washed the ink away. Once again this is a lost piece.

The original monoprint that this was pressed against does still exist and was in my solo exhibition YEAR ZERO at bitforms gallery in 2021. Contact info@bitforms.com for more information.
